700870.name: Polygoneer: Original Soundtrack
700870.description:
The Polygoneer Original Soundtrack is a collection of 6 awesome original Electronic tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus the incredible track from the trailer in 2 versions, from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!


All tracks are on MP3 format

  • S L O W M O T I O N (Original Mix)
  • Bahia Sushi Bar
  • Wahnzettel
  • Forced Issues
  • Pretty sure these arent normal mushrooms
  • Heavy Machinery Beat
  • [x] Wrong Choice
  • S L O W M O T I O N (Mini Mix)
  • Bahia Sushi Bar (looped)
  • Wahnzettel (looped)
  • Forced Issues (looped)
  • Pretty sure these arent normal mushrooms (looped)
  • Heavy Machinery Beat (looped)
  • [x] Wrong Choice (looped)
700870.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
